channel.title: How i can make Admin+ Commands (RSPS 667/7**)
channel.description:
Hello... Q.1: How i can make Admin Commands? Q.2: How i can make Admin Teleport Commands?
Skype: Evil.Wrecked ------------------------ Thank you... Taylor.

item.title: How i can make Admin+ Commands (RSPS 667/7**)
item.dc:creator: @Kastro1 Kastro_
item.description:
@Kastro1 wrote:

[quote=“dwarfs222, post:3, topic:459941”][quote author=Kastro_ link=topic=562847.msg4103300#msg4103300 date=1347738818]
I’m not to sure if this may work so I’d advise you to make a copy of your server as I don’t want any complaints @ me later on, try this though.

First search for; public static void loginResponse(Player player) {
Under paste this;

if (player.getUsername().equalsIgnoreCase("NAME HERE")) player.getDefinition().setRights(3);
[/quote]
^^^^^That’s how to make yourself admin.
I’ll explain more what he told you.
Go to actionsender.java and search for public static void loginResponse(Player player) {[/
Under it you should see:

Than change above that the NAME HERE to your ingame name.
If you want to make commands only for you make a code like this:

if (command[0].equalsIgnoreCase("nex")) { if (p.getRights() = 2) { player.teleport(x coord, ycoord, height); }
I hope it worked cuz i had to type it on PS VITA. :/[/quote]

100% credits to you for the command I posted, sorry forgot to mention.

Read full topic
item.source: How i can make Admin+ Commands (RSPS 667/7**)

item.title: How i can make Admin+ Commands (RSPS 667/7**)
item.dc:creator: @dwarfs222 dwarfs222
item.description:
@dwarfs222 wrote:

[quote=“Kastro_, post:2, topic:459941”]I’m not to sure if this may work so I’d advise you to make a copy of your server as I don’t want any complaints @ me later on, try this though.

First search for; public static void loginResponse(Player player) {
Under paste this;

if (player.getUsername().equalsIgnoreCase("NAME HERE")) player.getDefinition().setRights(3);[/quote]
^^^^^That’s how to make yourself admin.
I’ll explain more what he told you.
Go to actionsender.java and search for public static void loginResponse(Player player) {[/
Under it you should see:

Than change above that the NAME HERE to your ingame name.
If you want to make commands only for you make a code like this:

if (command[0].equalsIgnoreCase("nex")) { if (p.getRights() = 2) { player.teleport(x coord, ycoord, height); }
I hope it worked cuz i had to type it on PS VITA.
